website_summaries.verdict: You'll be prepared for every occasion with this large set of quality greeting cards.
pros: Crafted from sturdy and durable card stock
Large set of 40 cards contains no duplicates
Included envelopes are durable and have a decorative pattern inside
Set also includes a storage box and gold stickers
Wide variety includes sympathy, encouragement, and friendship cards
cons: Storage box has no dividers, making it difficult to find the correct occasion quickly

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING cards! I'm a forever customer!
customer_reviews.text: Call me old school, but I enjoy giving people cards for different occasions. I wanted something that I could have on hand so I wouldn't have to rush to the store each time I needed a card. This product is AMAZING! The cards are the same size you'd buy at a store (5x7) and the quality is superb! The cards are made of a thick card stock and the design and colors are beautiful. There is a nice mix of different cards for different occasions. As well, the envelopes are also made out of sturdy/quality paper. I am SO impressed with this product & will be buying ordering from them again!
customer_reviews.author: S. Karikari

customer_reviews.title: These are made of an excellent quality, sturdy card stock
customer_reviews.text: These are made of an excellent quality, sturdy card stock. The envelopes have a cute pattern inside and are well made, also. (These are MUCH better quality than a boxed set of cards you would buy at the store)! The only reason I can't give 5 stars is because some of the cards were too specific or too vague that I would not know what occasion to send them for. I'd get them again, though!
customer_reviews.author: buddefly

customer_reviews.title: Really nice design
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to have on hand in our office. I work in a marketing department so everyone is pretty picky about design, and boxed cards can be pretty wretched. But everyone that flips through them to get a card for someone always comments on how nice they are. It's hard to believe they are less than $1/card. The messages inside are nice and simple, nothing overly crazy. I plan to buy the birthday boxed set for the office as well, and I think I might buy this mixed card set to have at home as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, sturdy cards.
customer_reviews.text: I just received these cards today. I am super impressed with their sturdiness and can't wait to send one of encouragement tomorrow to our son in AF basic training. There have been so many occasions happen, since pandemic lockdown, that I wish I had a card for... birthdays, deaths, anniversaries, and encouragement. I have not stepped in a store in over two months... and won't for a card. This set is perfect and very well made, these are not the cheap type of cards kids sell for school fundraising! These are thick and impressive. Also, no two are the same! I love that.. so many companies only have a handful of designs to a box, at best.
customer_reviews.author: tmwlovesamazon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful all occasion cards - very well made!!!  Would highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The cards are beautifully written and the wording is on point, I am a member of a society and we send cards for birthdays, special occasions, get well and condolences to our ladies, these cards are perfect for any occasion, would definitely purchase again. Also, the cards are very well made and worth the money, very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Panarese

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Super nice cards!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely ecstatic with my cards! I needed a nice assortment of greeting cards for my office and this is the third time that I have purchased them...trying to get it right. I couldn't be happier. They are just what I had in mind. There is a great selection. The vibrant colors are beautiful and I LOVE what the cards say on the inside and out. Plus...the envelopes are the right size and they even come with cute little stickers for the back of the envelope. I will definitely order these again!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, thoughtful and attractive cards!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased to have found these high quality cards at modest prices. Often we send out cards for birthdays, anniversaries, illness and condolences to our Kiwanis Club members. Any Community supporting club has a membership who would appreciate being acknowledged. These would definitely do the trick. I’d use these for my personal friends, as well! Thank you, Cortesia!
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Giftable set — GREAT quality!
customer_reviews.text: First let me start by saying I totally bought this set as a gift for a grandmother in her 80’s because she lives sending cards BUT this set was so great I ended up keeping it myself! The box itself is sturdy and perfect to store the cards. The cards themself (in my opinion) are better than the ones you pay $3 each for in the store! There is a perfect variety and they are amazing quality! I won’t have to shop for cards for a couple years now 😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Rain

customer_reviews.title: Cortesia 40 All Occasion Cards
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made cards at a very reasonable price. They are in a sturdy box and have beautiful verses. When opened, I found a Thank You note from the Company, a promotional $10 Gift Card, which I am not sure how to redeem yet, and a chance to win $50 towards future Amazon purchases by registering for a monthly drawing. The extras are nice but the quality of the cards is what makes this purchase well worth the price. I have purchased several ‘bulk’ cards and have been disappointed in the quality and verses inside the cards. I send a lot of cards and will be purchasing from Cortesia again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more last-minute birthday card runs
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect, it's always a good idea to have cards on hand for various occasions, and these are really high-quality cards, esp. for the price. I'm so glad I won't be paying $6+ for a last-minute drugstore birthday card or thank-you-note. Some of the cards are blank inside, and some of them have brief messages inside. You'll definitely be able to find a card that's appropriate for your needs each time you need one. Will absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Edianter

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are nice cards to keep on hand. Higher quality than many 2 for 1 type cards you find in some stores. They are not super embellished or fancy, but they are a good size and weight. I have purchased different collections in the past and these weren't the highest quality, nor were they the worst. I am thinking of buying another set for a recent graduate along with stamps. They are a good purchase and I do not regret ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: LLM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office!
customer_reviews.text: I am an executive assistant who sends out a lot of cards and gifts on my boss' behalf. This box of cards has a really nice variety to choose from and having all these cards at my fingertips is convenient & makes doing my job much easier! My only complaint is that there are quite a few anniversary cards that are for couples to give to each other - I was expecting anniversary cards that could be given TO a couple. The cards and envelopes are quality material and they all look and feel very nice - nothing about them feels "cheap". This was a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Trayce at the farm

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was SUPER disappointed with these cards. I was expecting handmade cards with decorations. These are flat cards with printed pictures. They are like the all occasion greeting cards I bought years ago in a box at the store. I guess I didn't read the description well.
customer_reviews.author: Garret

customer_reviews.title: Great cards, great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a great buy!! So I bought the pack so I can send more cards plus sometimes I forget to get cards from the store. And cards are so expensive. I am so happy I bought this pack of cards. When it says premium.... They aren't kidding. The card is so thick and envelopes are great. There are a lot of different cards which was nice. The only dislike I have is that there were two blue baby shower cards instead of one pink and one blue. But I would recommend anyone to buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, high quality
customer_reviews.text: These cards are beautiful! They come with a good variety of card types, they are printed on heavy paper, and the messages are nice inside. I am very pleased. I will never have to buy a $5 card from the store for these card categories!!! Good deal! Also, when you order, you get a coupon to use on your next visit to their store! I already used mine to buy the birthday set and then got another coupon and I am going to be ordering for my mom!
customer_reviews.author: Allison S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cards
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set of cards. I am old school and still send out cards. The quality of the card stock was great, the printing and assortment was good. There are enough cards to see me through a few months and save me trips to the store. Two have already been sent and used. If there was a different assortment I would certainly buy them now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly 30 Unique Cards
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the Cortesian card assortment. My wife and I mail out quite a large number of greeting cards throughout the year, for all occasions. It's nice to have a good assortment on hand and not have to drive somewhere to buy them."
customer_reviews.author: David L. Wegman

customer_reviews.title: Nice cards, but the "nice & sturdy gift box" they come in was used as the shipping box
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment, great quality, nice cards overall. I just wish that Amazon had not used the "nice & sturdy gift box" in which the cards are to be stored as the shipping box. What would have been a relatively attractive box now has a shipping label stuck to two sides. This is why I gave only two stars to packaging. Otherwise, everything is as described and just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ole Doc PJ

customer_reviews.title: High quality paper and graphics
customer_reviews.text: This is the only way to go when purchasing greeting cards. It allows a consumer to purchase fine cards at very reasonable prices. I've bought two assortment boxes of Cortesia cards, and will buy more when the time comes. The cards look and feel professional, and are graphically interesting. You will not go wrong with this company's products. Thank you Cortesia.
customer_reviews.author: Pauljs

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things I've ever purchased for my business!
customer_reviews.text: I know it sounds crazy but this assorted greeting cards set is by far one of the best things I've purchased for my law firm. We send them to clients. They help to maintain an authentic connection with clients long after they matter has been finalized by the firm. We want our clients to see us as apart of their family. Excellent quality also! I will continue to purchase these cards as they are an amazing value!
customer_reviews.author: Melaniece Bardley McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mother in law that has trouble getting out. I bought these and put forever postage stamps with this set so she would always have cards for every occasion to send. She was very happy with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Seidel

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I like to keep cards in my house for last min things and so I don’t always have to run to the store for cards. This is box is amazing!!! The value for your money is insane. Cards these days are so expensive. Plus, the cards in this box are soooooo cute. Zero complaints. I will never not continue to buy this when i run out.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Nice cards
customer_reviews.text: They’re nice all around cards. Too many congrats, wedding, baby and that type. I mostly need BD, thanks, friendship. Would be nice if you had a nice sturdy box with dividers, and a little sign sticking up to say which is which. I do have a box like that that had Susan Branch cards that I stuffed these into, but no room for envelopes.
customer_reviews.author: F. Tague

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this set is so nice and looks professional. Would be perfect for personal reasons too! I bought this to keep in my office. I manage a group of employees and it's handy to have a box of cards this nice around for all occasions in which my employees should be recognized and/or supported. This box covers just about everything! Will recommend to the other managers I work with and will buy again when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Rivard

customer_reviews.title: No more running to the store for a last minute card!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO IMPRESSED with this set of cards! I am set for life! All of the cards are very high quality with trendy images—some blank and some with little sentiments inside. They come packaged in a beautiful box! LOVE! you will never have to run out and buy cards again, this assortment is PERFECT to have!
customer_reviews.author: Abagail

customer_reviews.title: They are okay for the price, but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. They are definitely cheap looking. I don't think I'd buy them again. I only actually like about ten of them...the rest are cheap looking. But for the price, it's not too bad considering people just throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Duran

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous cards and company!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are very professional looking and are bundled very nicely and neatly. They care very much for the small details and give personal touches in their products such as signed note cards to ensure you are happy with your cards. I like this personalized touch! This company will get my business again!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Orndorff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: A truly amazing set of cards for the price!! You really can't beat it. The cards are super high quality, wide variety, fun, and beautiful. There are so many nice details on the cards themselves as well as the cute notes they send you with your order and the lovely sealing stickers. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple idea with a variety of creative uses. Often times I find myself forgetting to or running out of time to get cards for the numerous special occasions my family & I encounter throughout the year. This is very convenient to have around for just such occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Law

customer_reviews.title: Nice assortment of cards.
customer_reviews.text: The cards are of nice artwork and words on the inside that will satisfy most people you give cards to for most occasions. Kind of generic, but way better than the cards that are blank inside or really lame statements. Would love to see an assortment of just one or two themes, like "only birthday box assortment" and then within that, an assortment of sincere, humor, for women, men, kids, etc. No regret purchasing this box though, just don't like having card lag around with no purpose and needing to buy another batch of cards when other themes are depleted.
customer_reviews.author: BigLouJr

customer_reviews.title: Cute outside cover stupid inside statements
customer_reviews.text: The outside of these cards are super cute, but I’m taking away one star because it would be better if the insides were blank. The statements written on the inside are kind of dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the Value!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They're super handy. I sell a few things on Poshmark and being able to grab a thank you card from here, or even a birthday card for a friend's birthday has been a life-saver. The price of cards these days is RIDICULOUS, and these are the best value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby P.

customer_reviews.title: The best cards for all occasions
customer_reviews.text: These cards are perfect! I’m always running around last minute for a card and now I don’t have to. I’m also super picky when it comes to cards, I usually stand in front of the selection reading different ones for a while. I love all the cards in the selection! There’s a variety of cards, all that can be used throughout the year. Only wish I had bought it sooner. Also, great price for 40 cards! Some cards are up to $6-7 in store which is ridiculous! This is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Burtchell

customer_reviews.title: Love the cards
customer_reviews.text: Love the cards. The quality of the collection is great and I am pleased to send the cards to friends. Most of the collections of cards I have ordered are left overs and not the quality I like to use...but these are very top notch. Would order again when this group is finished....
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary A. Vulcano

customer_reviews.title: Probably wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety...and never before seen cards! They're different from what's out there.( Couple of mistakes in language, Writer would not exchange/correct) FYI
customer_reviews.author: Linna01

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cards
customer_reviews.text: This is a box of various greeting cards. There are multiple cards of every type with generic cards that can be used for any occasion. The cards are not separated by type which was okay since I already had a box with separators and it only took a short while to sort them. I recommend them because they really are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda J. George

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Loooove!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these cards!! The messages are so genuine and thoughtful, the design is unique and special, and the quality is exceptional. The envelopes are better quality than you would get at a drugstore, and it comes with golden stickers to put on them, too. Plus, you can't beat the price when you think about how much you spend for an individual card at the drugstore. Could not be more pleasure!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Great general card assortment!
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of all occasion greeting cards. Well constructed, great packaging and my mother (who I purchased this set for) is extremely pleased! Mom lives in a nursing home/assisted living facility and likes to have cards on hand to send to friends and give to other residents, this was the prefect set for that.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: she called and expressed how happy she was with the quality of the cards and ...
customer_reviews.text: This box of cards was a gift to a friend who is a shut-in. When she received the cards, she called and expressed how happy she was with the quality of the cards and the inside messages - also that some cards included were blank so that she could write her own messages. I will definitely purchase cards again from Cortesia when the occasion arises. Highly recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Greeting Cards
customer_reviews.text: I am a greeting card lover. Greeting cards are such a huge gift in a tiny package. I ordered these to cut down on the $$$ I spend on Papyrus cards. Don't get me wrong, they are awesome cards, but they can be pricey. So, I am excited to try these greeting cards. I already feel in love just opening the box. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stacee Williams

customer_reviews.title: Variety of cards but not the best quality in terms of paper and illustrations
customer_reviews.text: These are OK cards but probably best for more everyday occasions or people you arent too close with or something last minute. The paper quality is not at the same level as Hallmark cards and neither are the illustrations. But then again, it's a lot cheaper and it's great to have for last minute occasions.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyTreehouse

customer_reviews.title: Very good supplementary package to keep around if you run out ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good supplementary package to keep around if you run out of standard cards. A bit off balanced, with more 'thank you' cards than needed. But the cards are attractive and appropriate. Need a few more condolence and anniversary cards. But, I'm glad I bought the set/
customer_reviews.author: Regina A.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice assortment and lovely verses anf coloring
customer_reviews.text: I have already enjoyed using several of these cards. I will buy more. Nothing better then having cards on hand when needed. I bought three cards recently at local grocer and paid twenty dollars. They were no nicer then these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves me time
customer_reviews.text: I like sending cards out for all types of occasions and these cover the main ones. Much less expensive and easier to access than going to the store each month to buy for upcoming events.
customer_reviews.author: Kauai Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety and Value
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 55+ community and there are always people getting sick, having birthdays, etc. If I paid $5-$10 a card, I would be broke. These are great cards and provide enough of a variety to get me through a few months. Great value! I will purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary V. King

customer_reviews.title: Super cute Cards
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I open the box and saw all the different cards, the quality of them as well as the different patterns for each one. So happy to finally have a box of cards that I can just go grab one from instead of having to go to the store each time I need a card :) Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Holzberger

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and buy these,  great deal for thirty different cards
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, each one different, good for all ages. Compact box for storage. Very clever desgns. I prefer this to hand made cards where I think about poorly paid labor putting on the embellishments. I have immediately used three. Love the selection, really covers all occasions. These are as nice as $5 Hallmark cards
customer_reviews.author: Karen Norman

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute - Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These cards are even cuter than I expected. Even the envelopes have sweet interior lining to give it an extra “pop.” I love having cards handy for every occasion and every friend’s personality. It’s especially great right now while social distancing and wanting to send a little sunshine to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mandie Beeler

customer_reviews.title: Great card assortment, quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally purchase cards online but due to the stay-at-home orders I needed more cards. After reviewing options on the internet, I selected the Cortesia, 40 all-occasion premium greeting card assortment. They arrived the next day and are definitely "as advertised": good quality, self-sealing envelopes, great assortment...at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Webber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Because I am quarantined and I can’t get out. I thought they would just be the ordinary boxed greeting cards, I was so pleased and amazed to see the quality of the assortment, beautiful sayings inside, I would definitely buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value
customer_reviews.text: These cards are an incredible value! I was sick and tired of paying $5-6 a card every time at the Hallmark store. These are well-made, very nice cards. You can't beat them! SO glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Useful
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! I love this card set. The cards come in a very nice and sturdy box. I love that the cards are beautiful and some are blank and some have a message. Upon receiving I used a sympathy card for work and the next week a card for a baby shower. I recommend having a set in your house so you dont have to hit up a store every time you need one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This assortment of cards is gorgeous! I send a lot of cards throughout the year for all occasions and this is an unbeatable deal for high-quality cards. I would highly recommend these and will definitely be purchasing from Cortesia again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful greeting cards!
customer_reviews.text: These cards, envelopes, and stickers are amazing! Just reordered! So glad I thought to buy a bunch of cards and have them handy instead of buying a card each time something comes up
customer_reviews.author: Ali R

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This card set is amazing. Great price for what you get!! The cards are sturdy/good quality and so adorable! It comes with envelopes that have designs inside too, really making the overall quality that much better. I am so impressed and happy with this purchase. I recommend buying this set, 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic24

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cards!
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful cards- In the past I would make sure to keep an eye out for 3/$10 Hallmark cards or other sales and I would never have as many beautiful high quality cards as I do for this price. They really are good quality- not like a dollar store card. They are the kind of card someone would think you spent a lot on or made yourself with a machine or something. And I love the variety! Thanks so much for my beautiful cards. Will definitely order from you again!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice assortment of cards.will have them when I need to send a special card.fair price.fast shipping.THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: I honestly am so blown away by the quality of these cards! They are amazing! The designs are cute, and I love the variety of occasions you can use them for! Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Special Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these all occasion cards for a friend in a senior assistant living home who is unable to get out shopping. They arrived quickly and she loves the variety and quality of the cards. Hopefully the word will get around and I will order more for others. This is a wonderful gift for shut-ins!"
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cards!!
customer_reviews.text: The assortment is great and presented in a nice box. These are sturdy cards with nice sayings and I am very pleased with them. Now I will always have a card when needed.
customer_reviews.author: TwinrocksTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Amazed - Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: From the packaging and its overall presentation to the quality of the cards, this was money well-spent. I was glad to find cards with verses as well as a few blanks thrown in. I highly recommend this greeting cards assortment. You will definitely enjoy this set!
customer_reviews.author: LaToya M. Davidson-Perez

customer_reviews.title: :) Buy them if you like sending cards
customer_reviews.text: These cards are very cute. They come in a box for easy storage that looks cute as well on my bookshelf. The cards are not organized in the box, but they're a tightly put together to take up less space. (there are no dividers to be like "Baby Cards' and "Birthday cards", etc). I am glad to have purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Better than the big name brands!
customer_reviews.text: These are FANTASTIC! The variety of options on occasions, the different designs they are all great! The quality is awesome as well. I'm going to use Cortesia products from here on out! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: DLR163

customer_reviews.title: Good value, wording inside is a little off.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good value and assortment. The box is nice. The only negative is that some of the writing inside the cards is worded a little strange. I wonder if blank cards wouldn't be a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kts

customer_reviews.title: Not correct description
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because they were all occasion and got only birthday cards
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Nice cards!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by the variety of cards in this set. Sometimes all occasion cards in a set still don't have that much variety. Also, the card stock is thicker than I expected. Nice quality. Glad I picked them up.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Buy these cards and make your life easier!
customer_reviews.text: I was very VERY impressed with the cards I got. They all are amazing designs, each unique and beautiful. I got 40 if different types (birthday, anniversary, wedding, get well) and only paid 25. I used to go to the store and buy one card for 5 bucks and it wasn’t even as cute as these are. I am definately coming back to this company for my holiday cards. With a big family like mine I have so many birthdays and events that this has made my life so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these all occasion greeting cards because I wanted to save money on greeting and holiday cards I normally buy from CVS or Target. Before buying this variety pack of greeting cards, I would spend anywhere from 3-4 USD for just one card. With this value pack, I only spend a fraction of that price now. Just because the price of the cards is cheaper does not mean that the cards themselves are of lower quality. The graphics are elegant and clean. I absolutely love al the 30 unique designs. Also, the card themselves are thick and sturdy. Extremely happy with this purchase and I would not hesitate to purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Zam Tual

customer_reviews.title: note on delivery.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was noted as given to resident.. we found the package of cards in the driveway. this is my very first complaint. we have no idea to whom the package was given, but as stated, the box of cards were found in the driveway. ( crushable merchandise ) We appreciate our packages set against the garage door , easy access for us and out of "harms way". Thank you..
customer_reviews.author: Marie Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Happy with the product. Buying this product actually saves me money and the convenience of not having to go out and buy a card. I would order again only if I could pick and choose what cards I want. It only comes with 2 wedding congrats card (as described) but I need several more so I ended up going out and buying more at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful gift for someone who loves sending cards
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother-in-law, since she always sends cards for every occasion. It came in a really cute package with a thank you card, and all of the cards were pretty and on high quality paper. I later bought another as a backup gift for future occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, I wish I could give 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, I wish I could give 10 stars! These are beautiful, so many great designs, fully sized cards and the gold and silver foiling adds a nice touch. I can't believe the deal these are considering the fantastic quality and high-end appearance. Excited to use all of them and can't wait to order more.
customer_reviews.author: the_guy...

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Cards were sturdy and of higher quality than expected (based on the price). Unique designs are simple and universal so I can give them to anyone. So handy to have these available so I don’t have to run out to the store when I need a last minute card.
customer_reviews.author: xyz123

customer_reviews.title: Really ok
customer_reviews.text: Good card stock, selection and price. Ugly when you lightly wet the envelopes and the cheap paper buckles when dry. You get what you pay for. I will use with a gold sticker to close.
customer_reviews.author: tonibee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of these greeting cards. Great designs, sturdy envelopes, nice and simple greetings inside, and really cool variety of themes. Would definitely recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sig

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift For Elderly Mother
customer_reviews.text: This box of assorted cards was a Christmas gift for my (has everything, critical of everything, haha) 80-year-old mother. She absolutely loved it! They are high quality, sturdy cards. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SweetRooBarb

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the minimalist box before and I liked it, It was okay. I decided to spend 10.00 extra and go for another box, As soon as I opened the box I was very impressed. Clean, cute and overall good quality cards. I don't regret it at all and "might" repurchase when I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep handy for important dates
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Nice design. I keep these at work for when I write the date then hit my forehead and remember the date is someone's birthday...or send a thank you, or (hopefully not too often) send a sympathy card.
customer_reviews.author: S. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these cards. Well worth the money. I will most definitely purchase these cards again. Thank you so very much for the 10.00 Gift card to Cortesia
customer_reviews.author: lobo

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection of cards
customer_reviews.text: Nice selection of cards! Bought this for my MIL as she is no longer able to drive to the store to pick up cards. This nice assortment of cards, combined with a book of stamps is a great gift for anyone, but especially for someone that is no longer able to get out...I actually ordered a second box for myself because I thought they are so nice!
customer_reviews.author: d Padezanin-Sklack

customer_reviews.title: Love the designs
customer_reviews.text: Love the designs. They are great quality and even better price. Received them in record time. Package was great and all included. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: DEE

customer_reviews.title: Unattractive Cards
customer_reviews.text: These cards look cheap. The styles are not the high-end I was hoping for and many I cannot use.
customer_reviews.author: LittleMiss

customer_reviews.title: These are so FABULOUS!!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: These cards are such great quality!!! The design and messages are spot on! I’m so excited to bring these to work and start using them. I love everything about them! The colors, texture and richness of the cards are exceptional! My only suggestion is to include a You’ll be Missed or Best of Luck type cards in the assortments. I’m so excited I bought these cards from you all!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Good Mix of cards
customer_reviews.text: Heavy paper, good quality. Please so far with the selection. Just wish there were more of the gold seals. It only comes with 12 of them.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good variety. The messages on the inside are not ...
customer_reviews.text: The cards are well made on heavy cardstock. Good variety. The messages on the inside are not ideal. Some are a little corny. Many that are blank can be multipurposed, ie thank you, birthday, thinking of you etc. Overall, for the price and variety I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: susan e fulton

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these cards. These are a great value. If you’re wondering, don’t.....it’s a great deal and great cards!
customer_reviews.author: Fonda Crites

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The cards are of good quality for price. However, I bought a variety pack so that I could have cards on hand to send to people. Specifically looked for a pack that had anniversary cards. All of the anniversary cards included in this pack are designed to give to your significant other, not other people you know. Which are the ones I usually need in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cards. Heavy paper with beautiful prints. Small business card & note in the box, from the seller with contact info, ensuring their commitment to the customer's satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Angela Burr

customer_reviews.title: Do you hate spending $4 or $5 on a card someone will ...
customer_reviews.text: Do you hate spending $4 or $5 on a card someone will toss shortly after receiving it? Me too!! This box of cards has a large variety of cards, from thank you to sympathy and everything in between. They are beautiful and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchin Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bargain & the cards are fantastic now I am ready for any occasion. Do not hesitate you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Marie C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards, perfect for an office
customer_reviews.text: I purchase Cortesia cards for our office, and always get compliments on the quality and design of the cards. They're perfect for the office, and they come at such good price for what you get! And the box they come in is adorable. I've purchased Zillomart and other card variety packs and not been as happy with the quality of the cards. So far, I've purchased 3 different boxes from them, and look forward to purchasing any new packs they come out with.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Greeting Cards
customer_reviews.text: We've been looking for such a wonderful collection of cards in various retail shops but located none. Very timely we purchased Cortesia assortment. Should we once again need such an assortment we know exactly where to go. Each and every card has charming, appropriate message. We love'em."
customer_reviews.author: Tommyd

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great value and nice cards! Lots of thank you’s and a few varsity and Birthday. Good card stock and I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Nank78

customer_reviews.title: Personal touch
customer_reviews.text: It was so nice to open my box of cards and see a cute thank you card from the maker! It was a nice personal touch! There was also a thoughtful and generous amazon gift card along with the note... I was excited just to see that my cards were delivered but the surprises on top of that really made my day..and the beautiful cards are the added bonus! Thank you Carmen and Cortesia!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Assorted Greeting Cards
customer_reviews.text: Good assortment for all occasions. Each card is different unlike other that give you multiples of a few varieties. Good selections that are appropriate to send to either a man or woman. Nice size,, good quality paper and assorted colored envelopes. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: You need these in your life!
customer_reviews.text: These cards are seriously so great! I love how detailed and special they look and feel without needing extra postage. Some cards I love more than others but they all amazing. It's just a matter of personal taste! The only thing is I wish I could buy multiples of some of the cards i really really love.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the cards and having them handy when in an ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the cards and having them handy when in an emergency. I just wished that the cards sat upright instead of laying flat. I have to take out all of the cards to find which occasion card I need. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Get back to card giving!!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and say just enough! I will use every one Of them. Everyone thinks a Facebook thumbs up is enough, what happened to handing someone a card. You can afford it with these and always have something in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Pebs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cards for a fraction of what you'd pay individually!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this selection of cards. They are colorful, lovely, and I cannot wait to use them. I also like the seals that came with the set. My set had 4 cards that were just for encouragement, and I liked that. I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: An excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. The pictures are a sharp quality the colors are right and the card stock is heavy gauge.
customer_reviews.author: eaches

product_meta.title: Cortesia All Occasion Greeting Cards Assortment - 40 UNIQUE DESIGNS with GOLD and SILVER EMBELLISHMENTS, Box set incl. Natural Linen Color Envelopes with Printed Patterns and Kraft Paper Cards
feature_bullets: ✮ SUPERIOR QUALITY: Each card is printed on high quality 140 lb matte laminated thick paper for extra sturdiness and great feel. Fully sized 5x7" cards, already folded, no compromises!

✮ 40 UNIQUE AND FRESH DESIGNS: No duplicates! Each card is unique and has a carefully crafted design and exclusive message inside. There’s plenty of variety across card styles to suit all your needs, and 7 cards are left blank inside for your custom messages.

✮ SPECIAL ENVELOPES: Includes 42 Envelopes: 30 Natural Linen color envelopes with unique patterns inside and a peel-off adhesive for your convenience. 12 Classic envelopes with gummed flaps (Plain White & Brown Kraft). All made of durable 80 lb paper as usual.

✮ GOLD & SILVER EMBELLISHMENTS: 8 of the cards boast beautifully crafted gold and silver embellishments that really pop out and add to their character. Your recipients won't believe these cards came from a bulk set!

✮ ALWAYS HAVE A CARD AT HAND: The NEW perfect ratio of each occasion based on surveying hundreds of our customers. Includes: 9 Birthday Cards, 8 Thank You Notes, 4 Friendship Cards, 3 Get Well Cards, 4 Congratulations Cards, 3 Encouragement Cards, 3 Anniversary Cards, 2 Wedding Cards, 2 New Baby Cards, and 2 Sympathy Cards.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars837 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
